name: node-js-website
author: Gustavo Amezcua subzero783
description: To install this express app, follow the instructions below:  1. Make sure you have NodeJS and NPM installed on your computer. 2. Clone the repo on your computer.  3. Execute the command of `npm install` in your git bash terminal at the root of your cloned repo.  4. Run the Express app by executing in the git bash terminal the command of `npm start`.
